bird_report.population_additional_info: No wild birds breeding. Population consisting of released project birds with some wild partners cinsisting of 34 pairs. Project started in 1989. As of up to 2012 only one wild pair has bred (in 1996), i.e. a pair where both partners are either released, and have returned from winter grounds outside Sweden, or wild born.
